===Team Awards===
===Team Awards===

The NCAA awards the National Champions a gold plated Wooden NCAA National Championship trophy.{{Citation needed|date=April 2011}} The loser of the championship game receives a silver plated National Runner-Up trophy for second place. All four Final Four teams receive a bronze plated NCAA Regional Championship trophy.The Best team ever Kentucky Wildcats have 7 National Championship.4 were under the ALL-TIME Greatest coach Adolph Rupp.They have over 2,000 win but what doo you expect from a power house.they have over 40 SEC Titles,wich is "Yes" the most of any confrence.Thet have been to over 10 Final Fours,14 to be exact.They also had John Wall,Jamal Mashburn,Rajon Rondo,Coach Cal,Sam Bowie,and More etc.Finally they have the biggest seated arena(Rupp Arena)with 23,000...Boy,that's a whole sea of blue.K-A-T-S,Can't be stopped so try us
+
The NCAA awards the National Champions a gold plated Wooden NCAA National Championship trophy.{{Citation needed|date=April 2011}} The loser of the championship game receives a silver plated National Runner-Up trophy for second place. All four Final Four teams receive a bronze plated NCAA Regional Championship trophy.
â
sincerley,

the NCAA
 
The champions also receive a commemorative gold championship ring, and the other three Final Four teams receive Final Four rings.{{Citation needed|date=April 2011}}
The champions also receive a commemorative gold championship ring, and the other three Final Four teams receive Final Four rings.{{Citation needed|date=April 2011}}
